titleStmt.title: A briefe and perfect relation, of the answeres and replies of Thomas Earle of Strafford; to the articles exhibited against him, by the House of Commons on the thirteenth of Aprill, An. Dom. 1641..
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641.
S. R.

notesStmt.note: Editor's note "To the reader" signed: S.R.
In this edition C1r first line begins "tions, ..". Quires A and B and several pages (e.g. H1v-2r, N1r, N4v) are in the same setting as the other 108-page edition.
Errors in paging: p. 18, 19, 22, and 23 numbered 10, 11,14, and 15 respectively; p. 62 and 63 numbered 63 and 64 respectively.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
